extendedIngredients.name: cherry
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 tbsps. of cherry brandy (or your preferred liqueur)

extendedIngredients.name: strong coffee
extendedIngredients.originalString: piping hot extra strong coffee (how much depends on the size of your glass)
metaInformation: (how much depends on the size of your glass)

extendedIngredients.name: vanilla ice cream
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 scoops of vanilla ice cream (store-bought is quite alright)

recipes.title: Ice cream coffee with cherry brandy

winePairing.pairingText: Cream Sherry, Moscato d'Asti, and Port are my top picks for Vanillan Ice Cream. A common wine pairing rule is to make sure your wine is sweeter than your food. Delicate desserts go well with Moscato d'Asti, nutty desserts with cream sherry, and caramel or chocolate desserts pair well with port. You could try NV Solera Cream Sherry. Reviewers quite like it with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 17 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: NV Solera Cream Sherry
productMatches.description: The Solera Cream Sherry has a brilliant amber and deep copper hue. With butterscotch and pecan aromas, the sweet salted nut and brown spice aromas carry a complex caramel accent. A sweet entry leads to a rounded, lush, moderately full-bodied palate with a lengthy, flavorful finish.

recipes.instructions: InstructionsPour the cherry brandy into demitasse cups (2 to 3 oz. capacity). Add the vanilla ice cream. Pour the coffee over the ice cream. If the ice cream settles to the bottom and there is more space for coffee, add more coffee. Drizzle syrup over the coffee and ice cream, of you like. Me, I like.Swirl the glass a few times and drink it up straight. Or use a dessert spoon to enjoy the watchamacallit more slowly.

steps.step: Pour the cherry brandy into demitasse cups (2 to 3 oz. capacity).
Pour the coffee over the ice cream. If the ice cream settles to the bottom and there is more space for coffee, add more coffee.
Drizzle syrup over the coffee and ice cream, of you like. Me, I like.Swirl the glass a few times and drink it up straight. Or use a dessert spoon to enjoy the watchamacallit more slowly.
